Quote.Author: Kerry King
Quote.QuoteValue: The worst thing about touring is the travel

Quote.Author: Kerry King
Quote.QuoteValue: I play loud onstage for my own benefit as I like. But I'm not too fond of the P.A. either

Quote.Author: Kerry King
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always using a towel around my head. Airports don't worry about me

Quote.Author: Kerry Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: You may not be thinking about politics, but politics is thinking about you

Quote.Author: Kerry Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: As a young girl, my real dream was to be the woman in the shows at SeaWorld

Quote.Author: Kerry Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up in New York, so I fell in love with acting on a stage, not in front of a camera

Quote.Author: Kerry Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: I would wear pajamas to work every day if it were up to me

Quote.Author: Kerry Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: I choose to feel optimistic, because I don't think I could get out of bed if I didn't

Quote.Author: Kerry Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: I bring something to the table as a woman; I bring something to the table as a woman of color

Quote.Author: Kerry Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: Shoes define how you walk in the world and how you stand: like, what is your posture in life?

Quote.Author: Kerry Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a person who's always been politically active and passionate about people's rights

Quote.Author: Kerry Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always working. My cousins call me the longshoreman of actors

Quote.Author: Kerry Washington
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't talk about my personal life in the press; that's how I kept my wedding a secret

Quote.Author: Kesha
Quote.QuoteValue: Glitter is my makeup of choice

Quote.Author: Kesha
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're around me, you're going to get glitter on you

Quote.Author: Kesha
Quote.QuoteValue: Be yourself. Unapologetically

Quote.Author: Kesha
Quote.QuoteValue: Just because I'm sassy and have a mouth on me doesn't mean I'm coming from a negative place

Quote.Author: Kesha
Quote.QuoteValue: I have haters. I have so many haters

Quote.Author: Kesha
Quote.QuoteValue: I deal with haters on a daily basis

Quote.Author: Kesha
Quote.QuoteValue: I want a pig. I want a pig on a leash. A baby pig on a leash

Quote.Author: Kesha
Quote.QuoteValue: You really can't stereotype people or put them in boxes, it's unfair

Quote.Author: Kesha
Quote.QuoteValue: I wouldn't have a No. 1 record or song if I wasn't a hardworking person

Quote.Author: Kesha
Quote.QuoteValue: I went through awkward, chubby, total weirdo phases

Quote.Author: Kevin Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: Before Footloose, the things I'd done weren't cute. In Diner I was an alcoholic

Quote.Author: Kevin Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: Things could be worse. You remember that, and you go on with your life

Quote.Author: Kevin Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to be a pop idol. Of course, my groupies are now between 40 and 50

Quote.Author: Kevin Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: A good director creates an environment, which gives the actor the encouragement to fly

Quote.Author: Kevin Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: I always wanted, and still aspire, to be something more than just one thing, just one performance

Quote.Author: Kevin Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a natural swagger

Quote.Author: Kevin Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm obsessed with zombies. I like watching zombie movies and I read zombie books

Quote.Author: Kevin Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: With a lot of actors, you've got to chip through the surface to see who the real person is

Quote.Author: Kevin Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: I started working in the mid-to-late Seventies, when television was not what it is now

Quote.Author: Kevin Bacon
Quote.QuoteValue: I used to live on Riverside Park in New York, on the Upper West Side

Quote.Author: Kevin Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: Believe me, I've taken a lot of heat for my mustache

Quote.Author: Kevin Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't want to miss out on something and feel like an idiot

Quote.Author: Kevin Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: My agent hates my directing career!

Quote.Author: Kevin Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm proud of where I'm from. I'm proud of Long Island

Quote.Author: Kevin Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: It's amazing what we remember as sports fans, right?

Quote.Author: Kevin Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a nostalgic guy

Quote.Author: Kevin Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: I think most people are afraid of what they don't know

Quote.Author: Kevin Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: I got no entourage in real life. Solo. I go solo. No entourage

Quote.Author: Kevin Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: The truth of the matter is, I'm a filmmaker

Quote.Author: Kevin Connolly
Quote.QuoteValue: There are people who didn't like 'The Departed,' you know?

Quote.Author: Kevin Costner
Quote.QuoteValue: Being a celebrity is probably the closest to being a beautiful woman as you can get

Quote.Author: Kevin Costner
Quote.QuoteValue: If it's going to be wrecked, I want to make sure I wreck it

Quote.Author: Kevin Costner
Quote.QuoteValue: You're this rat in the American maze, working your way towards the cheese, which is a job

Quote.Author: Kevin Costner
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a pretty convenient foil for a lot of people

Quote.Author: Kevin Costner
Quote.QuoteValue: I haven't tried to buffer myself. I like rolling the dice

Quote.Author: Kevin Costner
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think I ever take huge risks, though I'm not scared of doing so

Quote.Author: Kevin Costner
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't understand your limitations you won't achieve much in your life

Quote.Author: Kevin Costner
Quote.QuoteValue: Failure doesn't kill you... it increases your desire to make something happen

Quote.Author: Kevin Costner
Quote.QuoteValue: I split my time between Santa Barbara and Aspen. I live on a pretty fast horse

Quote.Author: Kevin Costner
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't have a seller's remorse about how I've lived

Quote.Author: Kevin Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: I look at my jersey and see the NBA logo, I'm like, 'I didn't think I'd be here.'

Quote.Author: Kevin Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: With everything I do, I just try to be myself

Quote.Author: Kevin Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I don't want to stand out too much

Quote.Author: Kevin Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: I always want to win because I never want to sit out on the sidelines outside

Quote.Author: Kevin Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: You know, I think more people should watch women's basketball. It'd do so much for the game

Quote.Author: Kevin Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: When people are used to you doing something, they want you to stay in that lane

Quote.Author: Kevin Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: My time is now

Quote.Author: Kevin Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: My style has changed and evolved mainly because I've grown to have more confidence in myself

Quote.Author: Kevin Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a guy that's going to brag or feel like I'm better than the group

Quote.Author: Kevin Durant
Quote.QuoteValue: I Tweeted Keri Hilson the other day and she actually wrote back! I was so excited

Quote.Author: Kevin Garnett
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned one thing - never hate a positive option

Quote.Author: Kevin Garnett
Quote.QuoteValue: Playing video games is something I enjoy in my spare time. I'm a gamer, always have been

Quote.Author: Kevin Garnett
Quote.QuoteValue: We have to do the impossible, but it is possible

Quote.Author: Kevin Garnett
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a problem sometimes with being too hyper

Quote.Author: Kevin Garnett
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of my friends snowmobile. I'm a little scared of it

Quote.Author: Kevin Garnett
Quote.QuoteValue: Coaching takes patience. I'm more enthused when teaching players who want it versus when I have to

Quote.Author: Kevin Garnett
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very simple. I'm not for the flashes, I'm not for glitz and glamour, you know

Quote.Author: Kevin Garnett
Quote.QuoteValue: There are a lot of things that frustrate me. I get frustrated when I have to wait at a red light

Quote.Author: Kevin Garnett
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't play to sweat, I play to win

Quote.Author: Kevin Garnett
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't control if people like me; I can't control if people like my game

Quote.Author: Kevin Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: When you stand for something, you've got to stand for it all the way, not half way

Quote.Author: Kevin Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: True wealth is not of the pocket, but of the heart and of the mind

Quote.Author: Kevin Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: I have trouble with letting go. That's my problem

Quote.Author: Kevin Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: My skin is 24 karat gold when a sun hit it

Quote.Author: Kevin Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: I adapt and I adjust to whatever environment I'm in

Quote.Author: Kevin Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't let the left hand know what the right hand is doing

Quote.Author: Kevin Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: Life is about conduct and how we conduct ourselves. But two wrongs never make a right

Quote.Author: Kevin Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: I like Peter Tosh, Bob Marley of course. All of Capleton, Sizzla, Frisco Kid, Buju Banton

Quote.Author: Kevin Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't want no handouts. I want to get it out the mud

Quote.Author: Kevin Gates
Quote.QuoteValue: I always wanted a family

Quote.Author: Kevin James
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no better feeling in the world than a warm pizza box on your lap

Quote.Author: Kevin James
Quote.QuoteValue: Thanksgiving, man. Not a good day to be my pants

Quote.Author: Kevin James
Quote.QuoteValue: I never played music, but it's an important thing ... the studying, the inspiration

Quote.Author: Kevin James
Quote.QuoteValue: A song can take you to a special time in your life

Quote.Author: Kevin James
Quote.QuoteValue: I never played a musical instrument growing up but I knew kids who did and took it very seriously

Quote.Author: Kevin James
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always had something in my heart where I root for guys who struggle with women

Quote.Author: Kevin James
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to put some positive stuff out there. If it works, great. If it doesn't, no problem

Quote.Author: Kevin James
Quote.QuoteValue: I took a public speaking class in college and managed to make the class laugh a little bit

Quote.Author: Kevin James
Quote.QuoteValue: It's always cool to meet people who can do things that you have no capacity to do

Quote.Author: Kevin James
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I invented the phrase 'Don't overdo it.'

Quote.Author: Kevin Kwan
Quote.QuoteValue: One of the dreams on my wish list is to spend more time in Thailand

Quote.Author: Kevin Kwan
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're the water boiler king of China, you're selling a billion water boilers

Quote.Author: Kevin Kwan
Quote.QuoteValue: No matter our background, we all have crazy families

Quote.Author: Kevin Kwan
Quote.QuoteValue: At least when it comes to food, there's no snobbery in Singapore

Quote.Author: Kevin Kwan
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born in Singapore, and I lived there until I was 12. I had a very fortunate upbringing

Quote.Author: Kevin Kwan
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not revealing any deep, hidden secret that there are wealthy people in Asia

Quote.Author: Kevin Kwan
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, families are fascinating. I choose to explore it through comedy and through comic situations

Quote.Author: Kevin Kwan
Quote.QuoteValue: There's always been this tradition of satirizing these rich groups of people

Quote.Author: Kevin Kwan
Quote.QuoteValue: Canada has become such a staging area for Chinese money

Quote.Author: Kevin Kwan
Quote.QuoteValue: People have always been fascinated by the foibles of the wealthy and privileged

Quote.Author: Kevin McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: My belief is you have one chance to make a first impression

Quote.Author: Kevin McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't live in D.C. I keep an air mattress in my office

Quote.Author: Kevin McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: Small business creates more jobs than large corporations

Quote.Author: Kevin McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: America is nation of people striving to make life better for themselves and for their families

Quote.Author: Kevin McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in a free market of ideas and not shying away from debate

Quote.Author: Kevin McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: Black holes destroy any objects that happen to fall victim to their gravitational pull

Quote.Author: Kevin McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: When gross public debt exceeds 90 percent of GDP, economic growth tends to decline considerably

Quote.Author: Kevin McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: We can't be afraid to call the enemy what it is: Radical Islamic terrorism

Quote.Author: Kevin McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't come from an Ivy League school or anywhere else

Quote.Author: Kevin McCarthy
Quote.QuoteValue: My family was not Republicans. I'm the youngest. I came to this party based upon choice

Quote.Author: Kevin McCloud
Quote.QuoteValue: I cannot look at modern buildings without thinking of historical ones

Quote.Author: Kevin McCloud
Quote.QuoteValue: The more of your private life you put into the public domain, the smaller your private life becomes

Quote.Author: Kevin McCloud
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't enjoy living in a white box flooded with light. I like shadows, small spaces, old furniture

Quote.Author: Kevin McCloud
Quote.QuoteValue: Life involves other people and it is a compromise

Quote.Author: Kevin McCloud
Quote.QuoteValue: Your home should be about enriching the daily experience

Quote.Author: Kevin McCloud
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no reason for your imagination to be fettered by money

Quote.Author: Kevin McCloud
Quote.QuoteValue: Generally speaking, I think that if you do anything with commitment and passion, it will come good

Quote.Author: Kevin McCloud
Quote.QuoteValue: Every breath we take as human beings damages the planet

Quote.Author: Kevin McCloud
Quote.QuoteValue: My father, an engineer, was the gentlest man I knew

Quote.Author: Kevin McCloud
Quote.QuoteValue: One mustn't mistake bling for excellence, just as one mustn't mistake quiet for mediocre

Quote.Author: Kevin Mitnick
Quote.QuoteValue: At the end of the day, my goal was to be the best hacker

Quote.Author: Kevin Mitnick
Quote.QuoteValue: The hacker mindset doesn't actually see what happens on the other side, to the victim

Quote.Author: Kevin Mitnick
Quote.QuoteValue: To some people I'll always be the bad guy

Quote.Author: Kevin Mitnick
Quote.QuoteValue: Should we fear hackers? Intention is at the heart of this discussion

Quote.Author: Kevin Mitnick
Quote.QuoteValue: My primary goal of hacking was the intellectual curiosity, the seduction of adventure

Quote.Author: Kevin Mitnick
Quote.QuoteValue: A hacker doesn't deliberately destroy data or profit from his activities

Quote.Author: Kevin Mitnick
Quote.QuoteValue: Of course I'm sure half the people there hate me and half the people like me

Quote.Author: Kevin Mitnick
Quote.QuoteValue: As a young boy, I was taught in high school that hacking was cool

Quote.Author: Kevin Mitnick
Quote.QuoteValue: So the ethic I was taught in school resulted in the path I chose in my life following school

Quote.Author: Kevin Mitnick
Quote.QuoteValue: I was an accomplished computer trespasser. I don't consider myself a thief

Quote.Author: Kevin Nealon
Quote.QuoteValue: I learned how to draw from being bored in school. I would doodle on the margins of my paper

Quote.Author: Kevin Nealon
Quote.QuoteValue: When you discover that you are going to have a child, it stirs up memories of your own childhood

Quote.Author: Kevin Nealon
Quote.QuoteValue: It is a great rush to come up with a joke that gets a good response from the audience. It's gold!

Quote.Author: Kevin Nealon
Quote.QuoteValue: Basically, I'm a people pleaser who has a knack for disappointing

Quote.Author: Kevin Nealon
Quote.QuoteValue: If people can't deal with their problems, they numb themselves a little bit

Quote.Author: Kevin Nealon
Quote.QuoteValue: A lot of baby boomers are baby bongers

Quote.Author: Kevin Nealon
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want a transcript of tonight's program, get a pen and write down everything I said

Quote.Author: Kevin Nealon
Quote.QuoteValue: Never wear a red t-shirt to Target. I enjoy helping people, but not every two minutes

Quote.Author: Kevin Nealon
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't play dead with a vulture. That's exactly what they want

Quote.Author: Kevin Nealon
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a wandering eye and a lazy eye so they cancel each other out. It's a push

Quote.Author: Kevin O'Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: If you want a friend, buy a dog

Quote.Author: Kevin O'Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: There's only one side with me. You get the right side. You get the correct version of the facts

Quote.Author: Kevin O'Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: I keep anywhere between 5-10 percent of my net worth in venture ideas

Quote.Author: Kevin O'Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not trying to make friends, I'm trying to make money

Quote.Author: Kevin O'Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't call me, I'll call you... I'm out

Quote.Author: Kevin O'Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't cry about money, it never cries for you

Quote.Author: Kevin O'Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: My worst fashion faux pas: probably orange shoes with white pants. I thought I looked spectacular

Quote.Author: Kevin O'Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: Money equals freedom

Quote.Author: Kevin O'Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: If a man could give birth it would be to a book - it's an 18-month gestation period

Quote.Author: Kevin O'Leary
Quote.QuoteValue: If a manager can't control his costs, fire them

Quote.Author: Kevin Pietersen
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone is into male grooming

Quote.Author: Kevin Pietersen
Quote.QuoteValue: It's tough being me

Quote.Author: Kevin Pietersen
Quote.QuoteValue: I have principles in my professional and personal life as to how things are done

Quote.Author: Kevin Pietersen
Quote.QuoteValue: It's the weight of expectation that's the hardest to deal with, really, from my point of view

Quote.Author: Kevin Pietersen
Quote.QuoteValue: Once you have the support of the lads around you, you can't ask for any more

Quote.Author: Kevin Pietersen
Quote.QuoteValue: The hardest thing is that you can't trust people now. You just can't

Quote.Author: Kevin Pietersen
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not fun facing a ball going 97 mph, trust me

Quote.Author: Kevin Pietersen
Quote.QuoteValue: Big players want to play in front of big audiences

Quote.Author: Kevin Pietersen
Quote.QuoteValue: I love England and I love cricket

Quote.Author: Kevin Pietersen
Quote.QuoteValue: I've realised I can be happy

Quote.Author: Kevin Plank
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe people change. I think that they can learn from mistakes

Quote.Author: Kevin Plank
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been a hustler

Quote.Author: Kevin Plank
Quote.QuoteValue: The purpose of Disneyland is to make people smile

Quote.Author: Kevin Plank
Quote.QuoteValue: Motivation, passion, and focus have to come from the top

Quote.Author: Kevin Plank
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm usually a pretty intense person. Give me an inch, and I'm going to go

Quote.Author: Kevin Plank
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a big advocate of the power of positive thinking, particularly for small businesses

Quote.Author: Kevin Plank
Quote.QuoteValue: Your attitude is contagious

Quote.Author: Kevin Plank
Quote.QuoteValue: Any self-respecting entrepreneur has borrowed money from their mother at some point

Quote.Author: Kevin Plank
Quote.QuoteValue: When you're winning, you're creating a dynasty

Quote.Author: Kevin Plank
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone must have a voice, and everyone deserves clarity

Quote.Author: Kevin Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Dudes know I'm not a threat. Chicks know I'm not a threat

Quote.Author: Kevin Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: All these people who say success changes people; well, no, it just magnifies what's there

Quote.Author: Kevin Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: It's like a dream come true. When somebody is paying you to talk about yourself, you've won

Quote.Author: Kevin Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: In Hollywood you just fail upwards

Quote.Author: Kevin Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: The older you get, the more you realize you cannot win on the Internet

Quote.Author: Kevin Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: If you're lucky, you go from being a movie fan to a movie maker

Quote.Author: Kevin Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Any book is a self-help guide if you can take something from it

Quote.Author: Kevin Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Long time no see. I only pray the caliber of your questions has improved

Quote.Author: Kevin Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: If there was no Internet, my career would have ended in 1995

Quote.Author: Kevin Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Indie film isn't dead, it just grew up

Quote.Author: Kevin Systrom
Quote.QuoteValue: It's funny: I was a photographer before I was a programmer

Quote.Author: Kevin Systrom
Quote.QuoteValue: Do what you love, and do it well - that's much more meaningful than any metric

Quote.Author: Kevin Systrom
Quote.QuoteValue: I grew up as a photo nut. Every Christmas I would get a new camera. It's a huge part of my life

Quote.Author: Kevin Systrom
Quote.QuoteValue: Great products sell themselves

Quote.Author: Kevin Systrom
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe photos is one of the underlying things in every social network that becomes successful

Quote.Author: Kevin Systrom
Quote.QuoteValue: Instagram is a media company. I think we're about visual media

Quote.Author: Kevin Systrom
Quote.QuoteValue: I care deeply about craft: the quality of how something is made and the experience it enables

Quote.Author: Kevin Systrom
Quote.QuoteValue: Someone once described entrepreneurship to me as a series of happy accidents

Quote.Author: Kevin Systrom
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Instagram' is definitely becoming a new entertainment source for people day after day

Quote.Author: Kevin Systrom
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Instagram' reached 13 million users in just 13 months

Quote.Author: Kevyn Aucoin
Quote.QuoteValue: Perfection is boring. If a face doesn't have mistakes, it's nothing

Quote.Author: Kevyn Aucoin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd rather have huge success and huge failures than travel in the middle of the road

Quote.Author: Kevyn Aucoin
Quote.QuoteValue: Beauty has a lot to do with character

Quote.Author: Kevyn Aucoin
Quote.QuoteValue: Growing up, my ideals were Barbra Streisand, Cher, and my mom

Quote.Author: Kevyn Aucoin
Quote.QuoteValue: I spent much of my life hiding

Quote.Author: Kevyn Aucoin
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm very passionate about what I do

Quote.Author: Kevyn Aucoin
Quote.QuoteValue: Soon I realized that if beauty equalled forgiveness, I was never going to be forgiven

Quote.Author: Kevyn Aucoin
Quote.QuoteValue: Today I see beauty everywhere I go, in every face I see, in every single soul

Quote.Author: Kevyn Aucoin
Quote.QuoteValue: Yes, but everyone is beautiful to someone

Quote.Author: Kevyn Aucoin
Quote.QuoteValue: I was absolutely lost in love and life when I did my drawings. Time stood still

Quote.Author: Khaled Hosseini
Quote.QuoteValue: People find meaning and redemption in the most unusual human connections

Quote.Author: Khaled Hosseini
Quote.QuoteValue: I give novels as gifts, and there is nothing I like to receive more as a gift

Quote.Author: Khaled Hosseini
Quote.QuoteValue: Literary fiction is kept alive by women. Women read more fiction, period

Quote.Author: Khaled Hosseini
Quote.QuoteValue: For a novelist, it's kind of an onerous burden to represent an entire culture

Quote.Author: Khaled Hosseini
Quote.QuoteValue: Writing for me is largely about rewriting

Quote.Author: Khaled Hosseini
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so fascinated by how people destroy each other and love each other

Quote.Author: Khaled Hosseini
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to be able to interact with people whose politics you disagree with

Quote.Author: Khaled Hosseini
Quote.QuoteValue: Afghan people are just so tired of war

Quote.Author: Khaled Hosseini
Quote.QuoteValue: I was told bedtime stories by my father or my grandmother. Books, I mostly read on my own in bed

Quote.Author: Khaled Hosseini
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't need a cheerleader. That's the worst thing that can happen to you

Quote.Author: Khloe Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: Fitness is not about being better than someone else... It's about being better than you used to be

Quote.Author: Khloe Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm strong and fearless and not afraid to take risks in business

Quote.Author: Khloe Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: You can say you're sorry 5,000 times, but that doesn't mean you mean it

Quote.Author: Khloe Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone expects me to be 9 feet tall and weigh 200 pounds when they meet me

Quote.Author: Khloe Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: The bikini waxing, after we go there you can't turn back

Quote.Author: Khloe Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: I just let my hair go - if there's no hairdresser around I really can't be bothered!

Quote.Author: Khloe Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: My weight fluctuates, like any normal girl, and I have times when I feel insecure

Quote.Author: Khloe Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: I have candles, pictures and flowers on my nightstand... and of course a lamp!

Quote.Author: Khloe Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: I've learned from experience you just never know what happens in life

Quote.Author: Khloe Kardashian
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm Armenian, but I'm very fair and I look white... I would always get such hate about it

Quote.Author: Kid Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: Detroit: Cars and rock 'n' roll. Not a bad combo

Quote.Author: Kid Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: Two of my grandparents died in a car crash. Sucks, 'cause they would have lived to a hundred

Quote.Author: Kid Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: I love to be pushed so I can prove myself, because once again, I will

Quote.Author: Kid Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: My take on rap is driven by straightforward American southern rock and blues

Quote.Author: Kid Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: Go where you're celebrated, not tolerated. I'm celebrated in Detroit

Quote.Author: Kid Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: Getting married was a ball. Being married was... a nightmare

Quote.Author: Kid Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: All girls want to be sexy

Quote.Author: Kid Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: I want as many people as possible to hear my music. I'm happy to entertain people by being a star

Quote.Author: Kid Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always made music from the heart, and that's what I do

Quote.Author: Kid Rock
Quote.QuoteValue: I think what I've learned out of this lifetime is you should be proud of where you come from

Quote.Author: Kim Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: Canada is the homeland of equality, justice and tolerance

Quote.Author: Kim Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: For too many, to work means having less income

Quote.Author: Kim Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: I know Quebecers don't want to relive old battles; they prefer to build for the future

Quote.Author: Kim Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe it is time for new leadership that is able to leave the '70s behind

Quote.Author: Kim Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no greater honour than to serve Canadians

Quote.Author: Kim Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd be prouder still to say I was Canada's 10th woman prime minister

Quote.Author: Kim Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: Government cannot and must not replace private initiative

Quote.Author: Kim Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: The world has changed profoundly since our programs were first established

Quote.Author: Kim Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always believed governments must adapt to the needs of the people, not the other way around

Quote.Author: Kim Campbell
Quote.QuoteValue: Canadians want to see real hope restored, not false hopes raised

Quote.Author: Kim Cattrall
Quote.QuoteValue: Really rejoice in being yourself. Have your own drumbeat

Quote.Author: Kim Cattrall
Quote.QuoteValue: Theatre can't be done again and again and again and again - it's organic

Quote.Author: Kim Cattrall
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel so much at home onstage and so comfortable in my body

Quote.Author: Kim Cattrall
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't express a lot of things that I feel; I kind of register things

Quote.Author: Kim Cattrall
Quote.QuoteValue: When I feel lost and can't make a decision, I just stop and get quiet. I take a time-out

Quote.Author: Kim Cattrall
Quote.QuoteValue: I always assumed that like my mother before me, one day I would have children

Quote.Author: Kim Cattrall
Quote.QuoteValue: I like my life. It's good
